play.name: play
play.description: Plays or queues a song in the music player, starting a new player if it doesn't already exist.
play.query_description: The query parameter, which can be a URL or a term to be searched for on YouTube.
play.unknown_voice_state:
Unable to determine which voice chat you are in, please join a voice chat or check my permissions if you are already in one.
If you believe this is an error, please report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
play.cant_connect:
Unable to connect to your voice chat, please check that I have permission to access it.
If you believe this is an error, please report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
play.is_not_same_voice:
A music player was found but apparently you are not in the same voice chat as it.
If you believe this is an error, report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
play.enqueue_one_uri: The song [**${music}**](${uri}) by **${author}** has been added to the queue.
play.enqueue_one: The song **${music}** by **${author}** has been added to the queue.
play.playing_playlist_uri: **${count}** songs from your playlist have been queued, [**${music}**](${uri}) from **${author}** has been selected to play now.
play.playing_playlist_uri_truncated:
**Warning: The playlist is much larger than the queue size limit, the total number of songs added to the queue has been truncated.**

**${count}** songs from your playlist have been queued, [**${music}**](${uri}) from **${author}** has been selected to play now.
play.playing_playlist: **${count}** songs from your playlist have been queued, **${music}** from **${author}** has been selected to play now.
play.playing_playlist_truncated:
**Warning: The playlist is much larger than the queue size limit, the total number of songs added to the queue has been truncated.**

**${count}** songs from your playlist have been queued, **${music}** from **${author}** has been selected to play now.
play.enqueue_playlist: **${count}** songs from your playlist have been queued.
play.enqueue_playlist_truncated:
**Warning: The playlist is much larger than the queue size limit, the total number of songs added to the queue has been truncated.**

**${count}** songs from your playlist have been queued.
play.not_found:
Nothing was found with the query parameter, it is possible that it does not exist or that I do not have access.
If you believe this is an error, please report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
play.truncated:
It's not possible to add more songs to the queue as the queue is already at the allowed limit, please remove some songs before trying again.
If you believe this is an error, please report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).

playing.title: Hydrogen: Music Player
playing.timeout_trigger: There're no more listeners on the voice chat I'm connected to, leaving in ${time} seconds...

join.name: join
join.description: Connects me to your voice chat by starting a music player without playing anything.
join.player_exists:
It's not possible to start a new music player while one already exists for that server.
If you believe this is an error, please report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
join.cant_connect:
Unable to connect to your voice chat, please check that I have permission to access it.
If you believe this is an error, please report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
join.unknown_voice_state:
Unable to determine which voice chat you are in, please join a voice chat or check my permissions if you are already in one.
If you believe this is an error, please report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
join.success: All ready! The music player has already started and I'm already connected to your voice chat.

stop.player_not_exists:
Could not find a music player on that server.
If you believe this is an error, please report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
stop.not_same_voice_chat:
A music player was found but apparently you are not in the same voice chat as it.
If you believe this is an error, report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
stop.unknown_voice_state:
Unable to determine which voice chat you are in, please join a voice chat or check my permissions if you are already in one.
If you believe this is an error, please report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
stop.success: The music player has stopped, thanks for using Hydrogen, hope to see you soon.

loop.unknown_voice_state:
Unable to determine which voice chat you are in, please join a voice chat or check my permissions if you are already in one.
If you believe this is an error, please report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
loop.success: The queue's loop mode has been changed to: **${loop}**.
loop.not_same_voice_chat:
A music player was found but apparently you are not in the same voice chat as it.
If you believe this is an error, report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
loop.player_not_exists:
Could not find a music player on that server.
If you believe this is an error, please report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).

pause.unknown_voice_state:
Unable to determine which voice chat you are in, please join a voice chat or check my permissions if you are already in one.
If you believe this is an error, please report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
pause.not_same_voice_chat:
A music player was found but apparently you are not in the same voice chat as it.
If you believe this is an error, report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
pause.player_not_exists:
Could not find a music player on that server.
If you believe this is an error, please report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
pause.cant_pause:
Unable to pause/resume this song.
If you believe this is an error, please report it [here](https://gitlab.com/deersoftware/hydrogen/-/issues).
pause.paused: The music player has been paused.
pause.resumed: The music player has been resumed.
